item.title: Holy Week Service Timings
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
Dear friends,  Greetings to you from Chaplaincy.  As we come close to the Holy week, we thank God for His love which is demonstrated in and through His only begotten Son, our Lord Jesus Christ.  We invite you to come and participate during these services.  For those who are unable to be physically present, the […]

The post Holy Week Service Timings appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
Dear friends, 

Greetings to you from Chaplaincy. 

As we come close to the Holy week, we thank God for His love which is demonstrated in and through His only begotten Son, our Lord Jesus Christ.  We invite you to come and participate during these services. 

For those who are unable to be physically present, the following YouTube links will be useful. 

Holy Week Devotions -Monday to Saturday – 3rd to 8th April 2023 – 8.00 pm – Scudder Auditorium

Holy Monday                            https://youtube.com/live/_Qp6KRBkh_0?feature=share 

Holy Tuesday                            https://youtube.com/live/Ok7mrm7-JwM?feature=share 

Holy Wednesday                       https://youtube.com/live/2jV9INkEwUc?feature=share 

Maundy Thursday                     https://youtube.com/live/qJ6gIM0MO4Q?feature=share 

Good Friday                              https://youtube.com/live/EquFkAmUYX4?feature=share 

Holy Saturday                           https://youtube.com/live/yZlpleCvXmg?feature=share 

9th April 2023 – Combined Easter Worship Service – 6.00 pm – Scudder Auditorium

With Best wishes and Prayers, 

Chaplain. 

The post Holy Week Service Timings appeared first on Campus Events.

item.title: Passion Week Recitals – Ranipet Campus
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
Let us come together for an evening of Passion Week Recitals on 5th of April at 7:00 pm in the John Carman School ground, followed by a contributory dinner. This event is organized by the CMC chaplaincy and the Ranipet Residents.

item.title: Summer Bible Camp at CKC
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
Dear Friends, Greetings to you from Campus Kids Corner! We are happy to inform you that the Summer Bible Camp (SBC) will be held at CKC from 11th April to 15th April 2023. It will be led by Mr. George Stephenson, Director, Flock Ministries, India and team. The sessions will be based on the theme “Beautiful […]

The post Summer Bible Camp at CKC appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
Dear Friends,

Greetings to you from Campus Kids Corner!

We are happy to inform you that the Summer Bible Camp (SBC) will be held at CKC from 11th April to 15th April 2023.

It will be led by Mr. George Stephenson, Director, Flock Ministries, India and team. The sessions will be based on the theme “Beautiful Talents” (Matthew 25:14-29). This is open for children of all ages and all children above the age of 4 are most welcome to register before 31st March 2023. The registration fee is Rs 500/- and the bus fee is Rs 300/- (if required)

Buses will be available from the Ranipet Campus, KPTR Campus (via route 2) and from the CMC Main Campus (via route1).

Forms are available at CKC. 

Principal, Campus Kids Corner

The post Summer Bible Camp at CKC appeared first on Campus Events.

item.title: Resurrection Morn – Presented by the CMC Chittoor Choir
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
The CMC Choir at Chittoor presents "Resurrection Morn", an Easter Musical.

The post Resurrection Morn – Presented by the CMC Chittoor Choir appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
The CMC Choir at Chittoor presents “Resurrection Morn”, an Easter Musical. This will be held on 4th of April (Tuesday) at 6:00 pm at the CMC Chittoor patient waiting area (Near Chapel).

The post Resurrection Morn – Presented by the CMC Chittoor Choir appeared first on Campus Events.
